problem_text: (P. Neumann). Can the free group on two generators be embedded in Sym (N) so that the image of every non-identity element has only a finite number of orbits? A. M. W. Glass
answer: Yes, it can (H. D. Macpherson, in: Ordered groups and infinite permutation groups, Partially based on Conf. Luminy, France, 1993 (Mathematics and its Applications, 354), Kluwer, Dordrecht, 1996, 221–230).
